subject: Suits and Litigation
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Mayfield’s stepmother has sued him, claiming Mayfield, who has been suspended as a driver by Nascar, made slanderous, false and defamatory statements.
snippet: Jeremy Mayfield’s stepmother has sued him, claiming Mayfield, who has been suspended as a driver by Nascar, made slanderous, false and defamatory statements.
